name: Jupiter: Token Price
title: Get Token Price via Jupiter
description: Get the current USD price of a Solana token using the Jupiter Price API.

inputs.name: Token Mint
inputs.description: The mint address of the token.

output.TOKEN_DATA: transform:() => { const data = results.out; const keys = Object.keys(data); return keys.length > 0 ? data[keys[0]] : null; }
output.PRICE_FORMATTED: transform:() => { const p = results.USD_PRICE; return p != null ? '$' + Number(p).toFixed(2) : 'N/A'; }
